description: Disables the email channel for an application and deletes any existing settings for the channel.

parameters.name: ApplicationId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the application. This identifier is displayed as the Project ID on the Amazon Pinpoint console.

nested_items.name: EmailChannelResponse
nested_items.description: Provides information about the status and settings of the email channel for an application.

nested_items.name: ApplicationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the application that the email channel applies to.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationSet
nested_items.description: The Amazon SES configuration set that's applied to messages that are sent through the channel.

nested_items.name: CreationDate
nested_items.description: The date and time, in ISO 8601 format, when the email channel was enabled.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the email channel is enabled for the application.

nested_items.name: FromAddress
nested_items.description: The verified email address that email is sent from when you send email through the channel.

nested_items.name: HasCredential
nested_items.description: (Not used) This property is retained only for backward compatibility.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: (Deprecated) An identifier for the email channel. This property is retained only for backward compatibility.

nested_items.name: Identity
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the identity, verified with Amazon Simple Email Service (Amazon SES), that's used when you send email through the channel.

nested_items.name: IsArchived
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the email channel is archived.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedBy
nested_items.description: The user who last modified the email channel.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date and time, in ISO 8601 format, when the email channel was last modified.

nested_items.name: MessagesPerSecond
nested_items.description: The maximum number of emails that can be sent through the channel each second.

nested_items.name: Platform
nested_items.description: The type of messaging or notification platform for the channel. For the email channel, this value is EMAIL.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that Amazon Pinpoint uses to submit email-related event data for the channel.

nested_items.name: OrchestrationSendingRoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of an IAM role for Amazon Pinpoint to use to send email from your campaigns or journeys through Amazon SES.

nested_items.name: Version
nested_items.description: The current version of the email channel.
